extendedInfo.description: "VirtualRestaurant" is a restaurant management game.Let's make the store larger in the following ways!1. The frequency of customer visit is dependent on popularity of the store.2. The popularity of the store is dependent on feeling of customers.3. To purchase some items by coin.4. To purchase some high performance items by cash.5. High performance table, chair, and register makes to get coins and experiences faster.6. High performance cooking-range makes cooking speed faster.7. High performance food bar makes food saving longer.8. Floor of the store is extended by a certain level.

reviews.title: Best restaurant game
reviews.comment: I love this game it reminds me of cafe world on facebook. Great app keep up the great work
